syntax_editor_macro.comments: This editor macro creates the code necessary to access the function contained in the HtmlRenderTable script include.
syntax_editor_macro.name: HtmlRenderTable
syntax_editor_macro.text: var HtmlRenderTable = x_snc_devtools.HtmlRenderTable; HtmlRenderTable([[{ header: true, content: 'Header 1'},{ header: true, content: 'Header 2'}],['Row 1 Col 1','Row 1 Col 2'],['Row 2 Col 1','Row 2 Col 2']],'mytable','table.mytable, th.mytable, td.mytable { border: 2px solid; padding: 2px; vertical-align: top }');
